report.title: Locations list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN terms tinput ON tinput.id=ttl1.term_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vc on vc.location_id=l.id and vc.deleted=false AND vc.location_attribute_id=312 -- creation date LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values va on va.location_id=l.id and va.deleted=false AND va.location_attribute_id=159 -- area #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) -- Safety check so can't pull other sites. AND l.location_type_id IN (19142, 19143, 19144, 20207) #idlist# #order_by#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: type_termlist_term_id
param.join: JOIN location_attribute_values vt on vt.location_id=l.id and vt.deleted=false AND vt.int_value=#type_termlist_term_id# AND vt.location_attribute_id IN (331, 332, 333)

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to filter to.
